cause.description:
The government has no right to decide what we do with our bodies.
1. My body, my rules.
2. Seperation of church and state.
3. Legal abortion under medically controlled conditions is preferable to illegal back-alley abortion without proper medical supervision.
cause.mission: Maintain the right for abortion and ensure that women have access to comprehensive sex education and contraception.
cause.name: Keep your laws off my body!
